Clean Address

Source: R/utils.R
clean_address.Rd

Cleanse and format an address in a standardized manner by removing unnecessary elements and characters and combining the address, city, state, and zip code components into a single string.

Usage

clean_address(address)

Arguments

address

A character string representing the street address.

Value

A character string representing the cleansed and formatted address.

On this page
